an5.286:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.286:1.3: Panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, abrahmacari hoti, musavadi hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthayi hoti.
an5.286:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.286:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an5.286:2.3: Panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, abrahmacariya pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an5.286:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
